net.engio.blox.blockdef

Class CsvFileFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.engio.blox.blockdef.CsvFileFormat

  • public class CsvFileFormat
extends Object
    The file format definition provides the csv parser with information about the input format (value delimiter, value encapsulation, comments) and processing instructions like how to handle leading/trailing whitespaces etc.
    Author:
    Benjamin Diedrichsen
